## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
A condition is an expression, which evaluates to a `Boolean` value.
Windows Workflow Foundation offers two condition types: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>.
You can create a custom condition type by deriving from this class and implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A> method.
